I thought the council just said you had to redo the entire base 
thing... Seemed like it anyways. I recall someone saying its totally 
illegal which means in GM terms... "It didnt exist... it was just 
uh... I did not have sexual relations with that woman?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> It was sort of both, with a slight challenge to Zardus thrown in(I 
> also didn't want Mustex to have to go back to base because I 
> neglected him), so you don't have to worry about it.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> > Was that a post or a response to all the flames currently 
> recieved... 
> > I hope it wasnt a post because once again your post from before 
> would 
> > have come into play which was deemed by the council as a mode...

> > > Stallex had improved,but his dad was furious and figting harder 
> > than

to

test

realising

will
